channel.title: Parents on Terrace Community Middle School
channel.description: Recent content in Parents on Terrace Community Middle School

item.title: Parent Resource Association
item.description:
Parents of TCMS are resources for the school’s administration and staff, thus the name Parent Resource Association. The purpose of the PRA is to provide a strong parent base resource to assist the school in whatever capacity as determined by the school’s principal. Whether you are new to TCMS or a long time parent, the PRA Board Members are here to assist you in anyway we can. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions, please do not hesitate to call us. We want to hear from you!

  • 6th Grade Representative - Nakia Davis Email
  • 7th Grade Representative -
  • 8th Grade Representative - Vicki Camposano Email
  • PRA Representative to the Board - Karan Orbegoso Email
